title: Full-Time Undergraduate Student Quintiles of Cost of Attendance by Sector in 2014â€“15

metadata.notes: The figure shows the average COAs for students living on campus at public and private nonprofit four-year institutions. For public two-year and for profit institutions, it displays the COAs for student living off campus and not with their families. Students living at home with their parents have lower costs of attendance than those living on their own either on- or off-campus.
